body.p:
Head Quarters, Department of the Ohio,
Louisville, Kentucky August 23d 1862.
General Order
No. 1.

Pursuant to General Orders, No. 112, War Department, Washington, August 19th 1862. the undersigned hereby assumes command of the Department of the Ohio, composed of the states of Ohio, Michigan, Indiana, Illinois, Kentucky east of the Tennessee river, and including Cumberland Gap and the troops operating in its vicinity. Headquarters, for the present, will be at Cincinnati, Ohio, where all the usual reports, returns &C. will be sent

(Signed) H. G. Wright
Major Gen'l commanding CDepartment

Official:
C. W. Foster
A. A. Gen'l. --
